name: My Trainer is a Futanari
description:
"New year, new me!"

You decided to make the commitment of signing up for a full membership at your local gym.
You went the extra mile and got a personal trainer to help you along and hold you accountable.
Kendra comes highly recommended and with her abs of steel, she's often touted as:
"THE REAL DEAL".

Get ready for the workout of a lifetime!

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
Sexy Voice Acting
~6K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
